data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giroux, Marjolaine, Wheeler, Terry A. (2010): Systematics of Bulbostyla, a new subgenus of Sarcophaga Meigen, and change of status for Robackina Lopes (Diptera: Sarcophagidae). Zootaxa 2553: 35-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196855
